example.eg: He loves nature so much that he is thinking about becoming a park ranger.
example.egtrans: 他非常热爱大自然，甚至打算去当公园管理员。

example.eg: It's in a cat's nature to be predatory.
The forces of nature should not be resisted.  These hurricanes are powerful.
Look at the nature round here!  It's so beautiful!
example.egtrans: 看看这儿的自然风光！太美了！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自然风景, 自然风光

example.eg: He is rough on the outside, but once you get to know him, you realize that his nature is basically good.
example.egtrans: 他外在粗野，不过一旦你了解他之后，你会发现，基本来说，他的个性不坏。

example.eg: You shouldn't be surprised at his reaction.  It is human nature.
example.egtrans: 你不应该惊讶于他的反应。人的本性而已。

example.eg: Is a child's intelligence due to nature or nurture?
example.egtrans: 孩子的智慧是由于先天秉性还是后天培养？

example.eg: Data of this nature tends to be useless for our work.
example.egtrans: 对于我们的工作而言，这种类型的数据多半是没用的。

example.eg: In some documentaries, you can see people living in nature in Africa.
example.egtrans: 在一些纪录片中，你能看到以原始状态居住在非洲的人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 原始状态, 自然状态

example.eg: Due to its addictive nature, Vicodin is only available by prescription.
Lions are wild by nature, and there is little you can do to tame them.
That little boy is a force of nature!
Designing buildings to resist the forces of nature, especially earthquakes, is a challenging task.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 大自然的力量，自然之力

example.eg: A calf born with three legs is a freak of nature.
It was a freak of nature to get snow so close to the equator.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不正常的自然现象或事件

example.eg: Mary loves plants and her job as a botanist allows her to get close to Nature.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 亲近自然，与自然亲密接触

example.eg: The greedy man stole from his neighbors, but isn't that just human nature?
The government established a nature reserve in this area so that the tiger population would be safe.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 是...的天性, 是...的本性, 自然保护区

example.eg: We enjoy bird watching and other kinds of nature study.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 粗浅的自然研究, （小学的）自然课

example.eg: Last summer I helped build a new nature trail along the stream.

dsense.name: nature versus nurture, nature v nurture, nature vs. nurture

example.eg: It's a question of nature versus nurture: Are people born violent, or do they become violent because of how they are raised?
All living things are of an organic nature; that is, they contain carbon.
Driving quickly becomes second nature once you've passed your test.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自然状态, 天然状况, 原始状态
